column5: I've found some of the funniest things on this site to be other people's sign offs, I can't root through them all and I'm sure a lot of people never really think of them, I was just curious, what are the funniest ones people have seen on here.
LIFE GOES ON.      Get over it.LOL
For example brian's would be life goes on, kind of a silly topic.
Oh...Ok.....I like the one you used to have.  "If your parents didnt have children, chances are you wont either" or someting along those lines.
My biggest fear is that, when I die, my wife will sell all my fishing gear for what I told her I paid for it.
There was one, can't remember whose it was, but it was something along the lines of:  Walk a mile in another man's shoes, then you'll be a mile away from him and you'll have his shoes!
I like that one, my wife on the other hand did not see the humour.
if I cant fix it, ill fix it so no one else can..one of my favs
Light travels faster than sound. This is why some people appear bright until you hear them speak  or  If I agreed with you we'd both be wrong
Ask a question and look like a fool for five minutes, don't ask and be one forever.
Here is one I use to have as a signature and still have on my profile page:  I started out with nothing... I still have most of it.
I started life at the bottom...and I like it here  ( cuz I've been 37 years at the same job)   {{ & I'm 55}}
I just realized that on the mobile version on my phone they don't show.
